title: Emulator that emulates arm hardware
content: I want to hook arm instructions as they executes but most of the emulators are based on VirtualBox that uses houdini to translate arm instructions to x86, and i really can't hook a native JNI lib, moreover I'm doing a instruction trace please suggest a emulator that does it.

comments.text: hi bruh thanks for this, but i need a emulator that can run games so i can trace things this isnt graphical
